attributes.action: Ban all MPs from Scottish, Welsh & Ulster constituencies holding any Ministerial office and from voting on anything affecting England and the English.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban all MPs from Scottish, Welsh and Ulster constituencies holding any Ministerial office and from voting on any acts of Parliament that will affect England and the English.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
